sentences.english: A yellowish-brown nickel iron sulfide that is the principal ore of nickel.
sentences.chinese: 一种黄色矿物，含硫化镍，是少量镍的来源。

sentences.english: A yellowish-brown nickel iron sulfide that is the principal ore of nickel.
sentences.chinese: 一种黄色矿物，含硫化镍，是少量镍的来源。

sentences.english: Nickel naphthenate is used broadly in petrochemical and chemical scopes.
sentences.chinese: 环烷酸镍是石油化工领域内的重要助剂。

sentences.english: It is verified that SnNi eutectoid may results as they coexists.
sentences.chinese: 证实了锡和镍共存时能发生共析。

sentences.english: The structure of nickel film is analyzed by using SEM and X-ray diffractometer .
sentences.chinese: 利用电镜和X衍射对镍膜的结构进行了分析。

sentences.english: Polished chrome and sand nickel are available.
sentences.chinese: 备有光铬，沙镍两种颜色。

sentences.english: Root canal preparation with nickel titanium alloy engine file.
sentences.chinese: 镍钛合金机用锉根管预备。

sentences.english: The suggestions for developing the production technology of NiBR were made.
sentences.chinese: 提出了提高我国镍系顺丁橡胶聚合技术的建议。

sentences.english: Thermal fatigue property of Ni-based infiltrated layer on copper substrate has been investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了铜基表面镍基渗层的热疲劳性能。

sentences.english: Pattern was then transferred to a metal mold using Nickel-Cobalt electroforming.
sentences.chinese: 其次，以镍钴电铸将周期条纹图案转移至金属模仁。

sentences.english: Diffusion characteristics of copper in lamellar and columnar nickel deposit are also determined.
sentences.chinese: 并分析了铜在柱状和块状镍镀层中的扩散系数。

sentences.english: The performance of metal nickel was stable, so often used as electroplating material.
sentences.chinese: 金属镍性能稳定，是常用的镀层材料。

sentences.english: Nickel-cadmium batteries are used to provide emergency back-up power on planes and trains.
sentences.chinese: 镍镉电池也用作飞机和火车的应急后备电源。

sentences.english: The nickel adsorbed on peat increase together with the raise of nickel concentration in the solution.
sentences.chinese: 吸附液镍浓度升高，泥煤吸附镍量增加。

sentences.english: A pure nickel coating and n-Al2O3/Ni composite coating were prepared.
sentences.chinese: 制备了纯镍刷镀层和镍基纳米氧化铝复合刷镀层。

sentences.english: A pure nickel coating and n-Al2O3/Ni composite coating were prepared.
sentences.chinese: 制备了纯镍刷镀层和镍基纳米氧化铝复合刷镀层。

definition: copper (chemistry)/see also 紅銅|红铜[hong2 tong2]/CL:塊|块[kuai4]
